tool.name: NRT_Create_Project

param.name: out_folder
param.dialogReference: Set an output folder location to create the near real-time monitoring files into.

param.name: out_filename
param.dialogReference: Set the name of the project for easier identification. Example: "yandi_project".

tool.summary: Near real-time monitoring requires a project folder and geodatabase to store persistent monitoring area polygons and data cubes. You can create one project to store as many monitoring areas anywhere in Australia, or you can break up tenements or sites into projects (e.g., Ophthalmia Dam project, Yandi project, etc.). This is up to user discretion. Once a project folder is created, users should not move it.
